titles.title: Neighborhood Tobacco Advertising Act of 1998
To repeal the preemption provision of the Federal Cigarette Labeling and Advertising Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Telecommunications, Trade, and Consumer Protection.

bill.summary: 8/6/1998--Introduced. Neighborhood Tobacco Advertising Act of 1998 - Amends the Federal Cigarette Labeling and Advertising Act to repeal provisions preempting any: (1) statement relating to smoking and health (other than the one specified by the Act); and (2) requirement or prohibition based on smoking and health under State law regarding the advertising or promotion of cigarettes in packages labeled in conformity with the Act.
